title: Physics-Based Decision-Making Competency Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational knowledge in physics
context.additional_context: Course for corporate learners with intermediate expertise in managerial/leadership roles. Learning design optimized for mobile environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply decision-making processes with over 80% accuracy in physics problem situations.
Learners can analyze electromagnetism-related data and select three or more decision-making strategies appropriately for given contexts.
Through formative assessments, learners can identify individual decision-making error patterns and develop improvement plans within two weeks.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
